original_text: By this he meant the Spirit, whom those who believed in him were later to receive. Up to that time the Spirit had not been given, since Jesus had not yet been glorified.
korean_text: 이는 그를 믿는 자들이 받을 성령을 가리켜 말씀하신 것이라 (예수께서 아직 영광을 받지 않으셨으므로 성령이 아직 그들에게 계시지 아니하시더라)

sentences.original_text: By this he meant the Spirit,
whom those who believed in him
the Spirit had not been given,
since Jesus had not yet been glorified.
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 예수께 아직 영광을 받지 않았음이라.
